movieStream.title: Inception
movieStream.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

director.name: Christopher Nolan
director.bio: Best known for his unique storytelling, Christopher Nolan is one of the most acclaimed directors of the 21st century. He has directed some of the most successful and critically acclaimed movies of all time.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

director.name: Christopher Nolan
director.bio: Best known for his unique storytelling, Christopher Nolan is one of the most acclaimed directors of the 21st century. He has directed some of the most successful and critically acclaimed movies of all time.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

director.name: The Wachowskis
director.bio: The Wachowskis are American film directors, writers, and producers. They are best known for directing the Matrix trilogy and the Netflix series Sense8.
